document_data.mainbody:
Arrit was an abjurer and one of five novice wizards stationed at the enclave run by the young Red Wizard Hinnar.
Arrits body bore a magical tattoo
Arrit was tough, dexterous, and intelligent and was trained in alchemy, spellcraft, and the scribing of scrolls.
Arrit carried a dagger and a small crossbow.
Arrits spellbook contained nineteen different spells.
Arrit alternated with the other five novice wizards in running the compounds sales booth with two other companions. When sales were slow, Arrit might offer assistance to the wizards responsible for crafting the magic goods that were for sale.
